picked_headlines.summary: KRAL enhances LLMs for clinical antimicrobial therapy, improving accuracy and reasoning while reducing costs and manual effort.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article bridges AI research with practical healthcare applications, showcasing a direct impact on clinical practices and cost efficiency.

picked_headlines.summary: AutoNAD automates neural architecture design for defect detection, enhancing accuracy and efficiency in industrial applications.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article highlights a significant advancement in engineering, showcasing the practical application of AI in industrial settings, enhancing productivity and quality control.

digest:
- *Filtering with Self-Attention and Storing with MLP* explores one-layer transformers, enhancing knowledge acquisition understanding. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.00901)
- *Are Neuro-Inspired Multi-Modal Vision-Language Models Resilient to Membership Inference Privacy Leakage?* highlights resilience in privacy attacks. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.20710)
- *OVOD-Agent* improves object detection in rare categories using proactive reasoning. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.21064)
- *Context-Aware Visual Prompting* automates geospatial dashboards, enhancing decision support. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.20656)
- *Monet* introduces multimodal reasoning in latent visual space, enhancing visual thinking. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.21395)
- *Post-Pruning Accuracy Recovery* addresses accuracy recovery in pruned DNNs using synthetic images. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.20702)
- *Aligning LLMs with Biomedical Knowledge* improves biomedical knowledge acquisition. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.21075)
- *EHR-R1* enhances EHR analysis with a reasoning-driven model. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.25628)
- *Safe and Economical UAV Trajectory Planning* combines DRL and LLM for efficient UAV operations. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.08532)
- *Code security for software engineers* emphasizes AI's impact on code security and practical risk mitigation strategies. [Link](https://newsletter.pragmaticengineer.com/p/code-security)
